performed as Jill Tanner in the season opener, Butterflies Are Free. A 2013 graduate of Point Park University’s Conservatory of Performing Arts, she has appeared in Into the Woods (Baker’s Wife), Wonder of the World (Cass Harris), and Bat Boy, the Musical (Meredith Parker). She can be seen in numerous short films and videos shot in the Pittsburgh arena. “To Ron and the cast and crew that have truly become a second family for me, thank you for an experience filled with smiles and laughter. To Larry Tempo, thank you for introducing me my true passion in life. To my parents and sister, thank you for always supporting me and being my #1 fans. I love you all.”
